sentences.en: A single Compare button might more accurately represent the action to users.

sentences.en: Can you regulate this watch so that it keeps time accurately?

sentences.en: Every detail of these is accurately reproduced in color and structure.

sentences.en: I believe I am capable of calculating the political consequences accurately.

Now scientists can forecast the weather accurately.

sentences.en: The article accurately reflects public opinion.
